name: Dead Climb
description: Dead Climb is a casual ragdoll physics-based game about climbing after death. The player is thrown into mountain climbing limbo and has to use his dead limbs to reach the top. Zombietaining!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 3.2ghz lub amd fx 8320 3.5ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 750 TI 2gb lub AMD Radeon HD 7800 2gb Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 2.8 GHz  lub AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4gb lub AMD Radeon RX 470 4gb Storage: 5 GB available space
